name: Lusid Dreams
description:
Description: 

Sid is an average guy who sucks at his life which is already going out of his control. He is always trying to escape from his duties and responsibilities. One day after he comes home from University, he closes his eyes and wakes up in his dream world. Since this dream has occurred during his vulnerable state in life, the things he fears about starts to appear in front of his eyes. This dream depicts the lifestyle he lives through, the whale represents his university’s dean, shark represents his lecturers, spiders are his project teammates and other items indicate his day to day life issues. The challenge of this game is to overcome these out of control challenges and be a better person at the end of his dreams is the main core story of this game.

Game play:

The character will move imbalance automatically through the path and all you have to do is to control him using the keys A and D to the sideways of the path without hitting the obstacles. You also have to reach the destination in a minimal time. Whoever gets to reach the location within the time will count as the Best scorer.

Controls:

  • Movement: Press A to move the character to the left and press D to move the character to the left.
